StiDetector.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*
00002  * StiDetector represents a detector for the purposes of ITTF tracking.
00003  * It contains all information about the geometry of the detector and
00004  * the necessary physical properties for incorporating it in tracking.
00005  */
00006 
00007 #ifndef STI_DETECTOR_HH
00008 #define STI_DETECTOR_HH
00009 
00010 #include <string>
00011 using std::string;
00012 
00013 class StiMaterial;
00014 class StiShape;
00015 class StiPlacement;
00016 
00017 class StiDetector {
00018     
00019 public:
00020 
00021     // con/destructor
00022     StiDetector();
00023     virtual ~StiDetector();
00024     
00025     // accessors
00026     bool isOn() const {return on;}
00027     bool isActive() const { return active; }
00028     bool isContinuousMedium() const { return continuousMedium; }
00029     bool isDiscreteScatterer() const { return discreteScatterer; }
00030 
00031     StiMaterial* getGas() const { return gas; }
00032     StiMaterial* getMaterial() const { return material; }
00033 
00034     StiShape* getShape() const { return shape; }
00035     StiPlacement* getPlacement() const { return placement; }
00036 
00037     const string& getName() const {return name;}
00038     
00039     // mutators
00040     void setIsOn(bool val) {on = val;}
00041     void setIsActive(bool val) {active = val;}
00042     void setIsContinuousMedium(bool val) {continuousMedium = val;}
00043     void setIsDiscreteScatterer(bool val) {discreteScatterer = val;}
00044 
00045     void setGas(StiMaterial *val){ gas = val; }
00046     void setMaterial(StiMaterial *val){ material = val; }
00047 
00048     void setShape(StiShape *val){ shape = val; }
00049     void setPlacement(StiPlacement *val){ placement = val; }
00050 
00051     void setName(const string& val){ name=val;}
00052 
00053     //action
00054     virtual void build();  //for now, build from SCL parsable ascii file
00055 
00056     virtual void copy(StiDetector &detector);
00057     
00058 protected:
00059     
00060     // logical switches
00061     bool on;                  // toggle this layer on/off.  (off => NOT added to detector container)
00062     bool active;              // does the object provide hit information?
00063     bool continuousMedium;    // is this a continuous scatterer?  (yes => scatterer info given by "gas" below)
00064     bool discreteScatterer;   // is this a discrete scatterer?    (yes => scatterer given by "material" below)
00065 
00066     // material information
00067     StiMaterial *gas;           // gas representing the atmosphere in 
00068     //   (if it's a continuous medium) and/or  radially outward from the detector.
00069     StiMaterial *material;      // material composing the discrete scatterer
00070     
00071     // physical location / orientation
00072     StiShape     *shape;
00073     StiPlacement *placement;
00074 
00075     string name;
00076 
00077 };
